pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic

Class AnimObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.Image
      • pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic.GameObject
        • pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic.AnimObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.Renderable

    public class AnimObject
extends GameObject
    Class for fully animated objects like avatar parts(torso, head, weapon), etc.
    Author:
    Isangeles
